<title level="1" pfs="">[Nok-Nok (Level 1)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2397)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Nok-Nok (Level 1)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2397)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 57

**Perception** +14; (expert) [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +5, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +5, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +2, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +3, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +2, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +7, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** -1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Cookware](/Equipment.aspx?ID=17), [Flint and Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), [kukris](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56) (2), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), [wooden religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58), [torches](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) (6), [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 17

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
kukri +4 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +7 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**[Twin Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=552)** <actions string="Two Actions" />  

**Ancestry Feats**   [Very Sneaky](/Feats.aspx?ID=46)

**Class Feats**   Twin Feint

**Skill Feats**   [Experienced Smuggler](/Feats.aspx?ID=779), [Pickpocket](/Feats.aspx?ID=818)

**Class Abilities**   Rogue's Racket ([scoundrel](/Rackets.aspx?ID=2)), Sneak Attack 1d6, Surprise Attack

</column>
name: Nok-Nok (Level 1)
